      let bodyi := ml_of_lam envi l bodyi in
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      mkMLlam paramsi bodyi in
    let tnorm := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.mapi) ml_of_fix tb in
    let '(fvn, fvr) :=
      ((Stdlib.op_exclamation (env.env_named env_n)),
        (Stdlib.op_exclamation (env.env_urel env_n))) in
    let fv_params := fv_params env_n in
    let fv_args' :=
      (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (fun id => MLlocal id) fv_params in
    let norm_params := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.append) fv_params lf in
    let t_norm_f :=
      (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.mapi)
        (fun i =>
          fun body =>
            push_global_let ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) t_norm_f i)
              (mkMLlam norm_params body)) tnorm in
    let norm := fresh_gnormtbl l in
    let norm :=
      push_global_norm norm fv_params
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map)
          (fun g => mkMLapp (MLglobal g) fv_args') t_norm_f) in
    let fv_args := fv_args env fvn fvr in
    let mk_norm := MLapp (MLglobal norm) fv_args in
    let lnorm := fresh_lname Names.Anonymous in
    let ltype := fresh_lname Names.Anonymous in
    let '(lf, _env) := push_rels env ids in
    let lf_args := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (fun id => MLlocal id) lf in
    let upd {A : Set} (i : Z) (_lname : A) (cont : mllambda) : mllambda :=
      let paramsi := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) t_params i in
      let pargsi :=
        (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (fun id => MLlocal id) paramsi in
      let uniti := fresh_lname Names.Anonymous in
      let body :=
        MLlam
          ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.append) paramsi
            (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
            [ uniti ])
          (MLapp (MLglobal ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) t_norm_f i))
            ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.concat) [ fv_args; lf_args; pargsi ]))
        in
      MLsequence
        (MLapp (MLprimitive Upd_cofix)
          (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
          [ (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) lf_args i; body ]) cont in
    let upd :=
      (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.fold_right_i) upd lf
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) lf_args start) in
    let mk_let (i : Z) (lname : lname) (cont : mllambda) : mllambda :=
      MLlet lname
        (MLapp (MLprimitive (Mk_cofix i))
          (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
          [ MLlocal ltype; MLlocal lnorm ]) cont in
    let init := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.fold_right_i) mk_let lf upd in
    MLlet lnorm mk_norm (MLlet ltype mk_type init)
  | Nativelambda.Lmakeblock prefix (cn, _u) _ args =>
    let args := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (ml_of_lam env l) args in
    MLconstruct prefix cn args
  | Nativelambda.Lconstruct prefix (cn, u) =>
    let uargs := ml_of_instance (env.env_univ env) u in
    mkMLapp (MLglobal (Gconstruct prefix cn)) uargs
  | Nativelambda.Luint i =>
    MLapp (MLprimitive Mk_uint)
      (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
      [ MLuint i ]
  | Nativelambda.Lval v =>
    let i := push_symbol (SymbValue v) in
    get_value_code i
  | Nativelambda.Lsort s =>
    let i := push_symbol (SymbSort s) in
    let uarg :=
      match env.env_univ env with
      | None =>
        MLarray
          (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
          [ ]
      | Some u => MLlocal u
      end in
    let uarg :=
      MLapp (MLprimitive MLmagic)
        (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
        [ uarg ] in
    MLapp (MLprimitive Mk_sort)
      (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
      [ get_sort_code i; uarg ]
  | Nativelambda.Lind prefix (ind, u) =>
    let uargs := ml_of_instance (env.env_univ env) u in
    mkMLapp (MLglobal (Gind prefix ind)) uargs
  | Nativelambda.Llazy => MLglobal (Ginternal "lazy")
  | Nativelambda.Lforce => MLglobal (Ginternal "Lazy.force")
  end.

Definition mllambda_of_lambda
  (univ : option lname) (auxdefs : list global) (l : option Names.Label.t)
  (t : Nativelambda.lambda)
  : list global * (list (Names.Id.t * mllambda) * list (Z * mllambda)) *
    mllambda :=
  let env := empty_env univ tt in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  let ml := ml_of_lam env l t in
  let fv_rel := Stdlib.op_exclamation (env.env_urel env) in
  let fv_named := Stdlib.op_exclamation (env.env_named env) in
  let get_lname {A : Set} (function_parameter : A * mllambda) : lname :=
    let '(_, t) := function_parameter in
    match t with
    | MLlocal x => x
    | _ =>
      (* ❌ Assert instruction is not handled. *)
      assert false
    end in
  let params :=
    (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.append)
      ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.map) get_lname fv_rel)
      ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.map) get_lname fv_named) in
  if (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.is_empty) params then
    ((Stdlib.op_exclamation global_stack), ([], []), ml)
  else
    ((Stdlib.op_exclamation global_stack), (fv_named, fv_rel),
      (mkMLlam ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.of_list) params) ml)).

Definition can_subst (l : mllambda) : bool :=
  match l with
  | MLlocal _ | MLint _ | MLuint _ | MLglobal _ => true
  | _ => false
  end.

Definition subst (s : LNmap.t mllambda) (l : mllambda) : mllambda :=
  if LNmap.is_empty s then
    l
  else
    let fix aux (l : mllambda) {struct l} : mllambda :=
      match l with
      | MLlocal id =>
        (* ❌ Try-with are not handled *)
        try (LNmap.find id s)
      | MLglobal _ | MLprimitive _ | MLint _ | MLuint _ => l
      | MLlam params body => MLlam params (aux body)
      | MLletrec defs body =>
        let arec {A B : Set} (function_parameter : A * B * mllambda)
          : A * B * mllambda :=
          let '(f, params, body) := function_parameter in
          (f, params, (aux body)) in
        MLletrec ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) arec defs) (aux body)
      | MLlet id def body => MLlet id (aux def) (aux body)
      | MLapp f args =>
        MLapp (aux f) ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) aux args)
      | MLif t b1 b2 => MLif (aux t) (aux b1) (aux b2)
      | MLmatch annot a accu bs =>
        let auxb {A : Set} (function_parameter : A * mllambda) : A * mllambda :=
          let '(cargs, body) := function_parameter in
          (cargs, (aux body)) in
        MLmatch annot a (aux accu) ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) auxb bs)
      | MLconstruct prefix c args =>
        MLconstruct prefix c ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) aux args)
      | MLsetref s l1 => MLsetref s (aux l1)
      | MLsequence l1 l2 => MLsequence (aux l1) (aux l2)
      | MLarray arr => MLarray ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) aux arr)
      | MLisaccu s ind l => MLisaccu s ind (aux l)
      end in
    aux l.

Definition add_subst (id : LNmap.key) (v : mllambda) (s : LNmap.t mllambda)
  : LNmap.t mllambda :=
  match
    (v,
      match v with
      | MLlocal id' => Int.equal (lname.luid id) (lname.luid id')
      | _ => false
      end) with
  | (MLlocal id', true) => s
  | (_, _) => LNmap.add id v s
  end.

Definition subst_norm
  (params : array LNmap.key) (args : array mllambda) (s : LNmap.t mllambda)
  : LNmap.t mllambda :=
  let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) params in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  let s := Stdlib.__ref_value s in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  Stdlib.op_exclamation s.

Definition subst_case
  (params : array LNmap.key) (args : array mllambda) (s : LNmap.t mllambda)
  : LNmap.t mllambda * LNmap.key * mllambda :=
  let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) params in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  let s := Stdlib.__ref_value s in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  ((Stdlib.op_exclamation s),
    ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) params (Z.sub len 1)),
    ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) args (Z.sub len 1))).

Definition empty_gdef {A B : Set} : Int.Map.t A * Int.Map.t B :=
  (Int.Map.empty, Int.Map.empty).

Definition get_norm {A B : Set} (function_parameter : Int.Map.t A * B)
  : Int.Map.key -> A :=
  let '(gnorm, _) := function_parameter in
  fun i => Int.Map.find i gnorm.

Definition get_case {A B : Set} (function_parameter : A * Int.Map.t B)
  : Int.Map.key -> B :=
  let '(_, gcase) := function_parameter in
  fun i => Int.Map.find i gcase.

Definition all_lam {A : Set} (n : Int.t) (bs : array (A * mllambda)) : bool :=
  let f {B : Set} (function_parameter : B * mllambda) : bool :=
    let '(_, l) := function_parameter in
    match l with
    | MLlam params _ => Int.equal ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) params) n
    | _ => false
    end in
  (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.for_all) f bs.

Definition commutative_cut
  (annot : Nativevalues.annot_sw) (a : mllambda) (accu : mllambda)
  (bs : array (list (Names.constructor * array (option lname)) * mllambda))
  (args : array mllambda) : mllambda :=
  let mkb {A : Set} (function_parameter : A * mllambda) : A * mllambda :=
    let '(c, b) := function_parameter in
    match b with
    | MLlam params body =>
      (c,
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.fold_left2)
          (fun body => fun x => fun v => MLlet x v body) body params args))
    | _ =>
      (* ❌ Assert instruction is not handled. *)
      assert false
    end in
  MLmatch annot a (mkMLapp accu args) ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) mkb bs).

Definition optimize
  (gdef :
    Int.Map.t (array LNmap.key * mllambda) *
      Int.Map.t (array LNmap.key * mllambda)) (l : mllambda) : mllambda :=
  let fix optimize (s : LNmap.t mllambda) (l : mllambda) {struct s}
    : mllambda :=
    match l with
    | MLlocal id =>
      (* ❌ Try-with are not handled *)
      try (LNmap.find id s)
    | MLglobal _ | MLprimitive _ | MLint _ | MLuint _ => l
    | MLlam params body => MLlam params (optimize s body)
    | MLletrec decls body =>
      let opt_rec {A B : Set} (function_parameter : A * B * mllambda)
        : A * B * mllambda :=
        let '(f, params, body) := function_parameter in
        (f, params, (optimize s body)) in
      MLletrec ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) opt_rec decls)
        (optimize s body)
    | MLlet id def body =>
      let def := optimize s def in
      if can_subst def then
        optimize (add_subst id def s) body
      else
        MLlet id def (optimize s body)
    | MLapp f args =>
      let args := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (optimize s) args in
      match f with
      | MLglobal (Gnorm _ i) =>
        (* ❌ Try-with are not handled *)
        try
          (let '(params, body) := get_norm gdef i in
          let s := subst_norm params args s in
          optimize s body)
      | MLglobal (Gcase _ i) =>
        (* ❌ Try-with are not handled *)
        try
          (let '(params, body) := get_case gdef i in
          let '(s, id, arg) := subst_case params args s in
          if can_subst arg then
            optimize (add_subst id arg s) body
          else
            MLlet id arg (optimize s body))
      | _ =>
        let f := optimize s f in
        match f with
        | MLmatch annot a accu bs =>
          if all_lam ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) args) bs then
            commutative_cut annot a accu bs args
          else
            MLapp f args
        | _ => MLapp f args
        end
      end
    | MLif t b1 b2 =>
      let t := optimize s t in
      let b1 := optimize s b1 in
      let b2 := optimize s b2 in
      match
        ((t, b2),
          match (t, b2) with
          | (MLisaccu _ _ l1, MLmatch annot l2 _ bs) => eq_mllambda l1 l2
          | _ => false
          end) with
      | ((MLisaccu _ _ l1, MLmatch annot l2 _ bs), true) =>
        MLmatch annot l1 b1 bs
      | ((_, _), _) => MLif t b1 b2
      end
    | MLmatch annot a accu bs =>
      let opt_b {A : Set} (function_parameter : A * mllambda) : A * mllambda :=
        let '(cargs, body) := function_parameter in
        (cargs, (optimize s body)) in
      MLmatch annot (optimize s a) (subst s accu)
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) opt_b bs)
    | MLconstruct prefix c args =>
      MLconstruct prefix c ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (optimize s) args)
    | MLsetref r l => MLsetref r (optimize s l)
    | MLsequence l1 l2 => MLsequence (optimize s l1) (optimize s l2)
    | MLarray arr => MLarray ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) (optimize s) arr)
    | MLisaccu pf ind l => MLisaccu pf ind (optimize s l)
    end in
  optimize LNmap.empty l.

Definition optimize_stk (stk : list global) : list global :=
  let add_global
    (gdef :
      Int.Map.t (array lname * mllambda) * Int.Map.t (array lname * mllambda))
    (g : global)
    : Int.Map.t (array lname * mllambda) * Int.Map.t (array lname * mllambda) :=
    match g with
    | Glet (Gnorm _ i) body =>
      let '(gnorm, gcase) := gdef in
      ((Int.Map.add i (decompose_MLlam body) gnorm), gcase)
    | Gletcase (Gcase _ i) params annot a accu bs =>
      let '(gnorm, gcase) := gdef in
      (gnorm, (Int.Map.add i (params, (MLmatch annot a accu bs)) gcase))
    | Gletcase _ _ _ _ _ _ =>
      (* ❌ Assert instruction is not handled. *)
      assert false
    | _ => gdef
    end in
  let gdef := (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.fold_left) add_global empty_gdef stk in
  let optimize_global (g : global) : global :=
    match g with
    | Glet (Gconstant prefix c) body =>
      Glet (Gconstant prefix c) (optimize gdef body)
    | _ => g
    end in
  (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.map) optimize_global stk.

Definition string_of_id (s : Names.Id.t) : string :=
  Unicode.ascii_of_ident (Id.to_string s).

Definition string_of_label (l : Names.Label.t) : string :=
  string_of_id (Label.to_id l).

Definition string_of_dirpath (function_parameter : list Names.Id.t) : string :=
  match function_parameter with
  | [] => "_"
  | sl =>
    (|Util.String|).(CString.ExtS.concat) "_"
      ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.rev_map) string_of_id sl)
  end.

Definition string_of_dirpath (s : list Names.Id.t) : string :=
  String.append "N" (string_of_dirpath s).

Definition mod_uid_of_dirpath (dir : Names.DirPath.t) : string :=
  string_of_dirpath (DirPath.repr dir).

Definition link_info_of_dirpath (dir : Names.DirPath.t) : Environ.link_info :=
  Environ.Linked (String.append (mod_uid_of_dirpath dir) ".").

Definition string_of_name (x : Names.name) : string :=
  match x with
  | Names.Anonymous => "anonymous"
  | Names.Name id => string_of_id id
  end.

Definition string_of_label_def (l : option Names.Label.t) : string :=
  match l with
  | None => ""
  | Some l => string_of_label l
  end.

Fixpoint list_of_mp (acc : list string) (function_parameter : Names.module_path)
  {struct acc} : list string :=
  match function_parameter with
  | Names.MPdot mp l => list_of_mp (cons (string_of_label l) acc) mp
  | Names.MPfile dp =>
    let dp := DirPath.repr dp in
    cons (string_of_dirpath dp) acc
  | Names.MPbound mbid =>
    cons (String.append "X" (string_of_id (MBId.to_id mbid))) acc
  end.

Definition list_of_mp (mp : Names.module_path) : list string := list_of_mp [] mp.

Definition string_of_kn (kn : Names.KerName.t) : string :=
  let '(mp, l) := KerName.repr kn in
  let mp := list_of_mp mp in
  String.append ((|Util.String|).(CString.ExtS.concat) "_" mp)
    (String.append "_" (string_of_label l)).

Definition string_of_con (c : Names.Constant.t) : string :=
  string_of_kn (Constant.user c).

Definition string_of_mind (mind : Names.MutInd.t) : string :=
  string_of_kn (MutInd.user mind).

Definition string_of_gname (g : gname) : string :=
  match g with
  | Gind prefix (mind, i) =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "indaccu_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))) "%sindaccu_%s_%i")
      prefix (string_of_mind mind) i
  | Gconstruct prefix ((mind, i), j) =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "construct_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))
        "%sconstruct_%s_%i_%i") prefix (string_of_mind mind) i (Z.sub j 1)
  | Gconstant prefix c =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "const_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "%sconst_%s") prefix
      (string_of_con c)
  | Gproj prefix (mind, n) i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "proj_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))
        "%sproj_%s_%i_%i") prefix (string_of_mind mind) n i
  | Gcase l i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "case_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "case_%s_%i")
      (string_of_label_def l) i
  | Gpred l i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "pred_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "pred_%s_%i")
      (string_of_label_def l) i
  | Gfixtype l i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "fixtype_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "fixtype_%s_%i")
      (string_of_label_def l) i
  | Gnorm l i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "norm_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "norm_%s_%i")
      (string_of_label_def l) i
  | Ginternal s =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "%s") s
  | Gnormtbl l i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "normtbl_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "normtbl_%s_%i")
      (string_of_label_def l) i
  | Grel i =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "rel_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "rel_%i") i
  | Gnamed id =>
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "named_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "named_%s")
      (string_of_id id)
  end.

Definition pp_gname (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (g : gname) : unit :=
  Format.fprintf fmt
    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
        CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "%s") (string_of_gname g).

Definition pp_lname (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (ln : lname) : unit :=
  Format.fprintf fmt
    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "x_"
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "x_%s_%i")
    (string_of_name (lname.lname ln)) (lname.luid ln).

Definition pp_ldecls (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (ids : array lname)
  : unit :=
  let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) ids in
  (* ❌ For loops not handled. *)
  for.

Definition string_of_construct
  (prefix : string) (function_parameter : (Names.MutInd.t * Z) * Z) : string :=
  let '((mind, i), j) := function_parameter in
  let id :=
    Format.sprintf
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Construct_"
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
        "Construct_%s_%i_%i") (string_of_mind mind) i (Z.sub j 1) in
  String.append prefix id.

Definition pp_int (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (i : Z) : unit :=
  if OCaml.Stdlib.lt i 0 then
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%i)") i
  else
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "%i") i.

Definition pp_mllam (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (l : mllambda) : unit :=
  let fix pp_mllam (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (l : mllambda) {struct fmt}
    : unit :=
    match l with
    | MLlocal ln =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "@[%a@]") pp_lname ln
    | MLglobal g =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "@[%a@]") pp_gname g
    | MLprimitive p =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "@[%a@]") pp_primitive
        p
    | MLlam ids body =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(fun"
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "->"
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))))
          "@[(fun%a@ ->@\n %a)@]") pp_ldecls ids pp_mllam body
    | MLletrec defs body =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "in"
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))
          "@[%a@ in@\n%a@]") pp_letrec defs pp_mllam body
    | MLlet id def body =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(let"
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "=" % char
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "in"
                                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal
                                      ")" % char
                                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))))))))
          "@[(let@ %a@ =@\n %a@ in@\n%a)@]") pp_lname id pp_mllam def pp_mllam
        body
    | MLapp f args =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))) "@[%a@ %a@]")
        pp_mllam f (pp_args true) args
    | MLif t l1 l2 =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(if "
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " then"
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "else"
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal
                                    ")" % char
                                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))))))))
          "@[(if %a then@\n  %a@\nelse@\n  %a)@]") pp_mllam t pp_mllam l1
        pp_mllam l2
    | MLmatch annot c accu_br br =>
      let '(mind, i) := Nativevalues.annot_sw.asw_ind annot in
      let prefix := Nativevalues.annot_sw.asw_prefix annot in
      let accu :=
        Format.sprintf
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Accu_"
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))) "%sAccu_%s_%i")
          prefix (string_of_mind mind) i in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "begin match Obj.magic ("
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal ") with"
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "| "
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " _ ->"
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal
                                      "end"
                                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))))))))
          "@[begin match Obj.magic (%a) with@\n| %s _ ->@\n  %a@\n%aend@]")
        pp_mllam c accu pp_mllam accu_br (pp_branches prefix) br
    | MLconstruct prefix c args =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(Obj.magic ("
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal ") : Nativevalues.t)"
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
          "@[(Obj.magic (%s%a) : Nativevalues.t)@]")
        (string_of_construct prefix c) pp_cargs args
    | MLint i => pp_int fmt i
    | MLuint i =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%s)")
        (Uint63.compile i)
    | MLsetref s body =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Break "@ " 1 0)
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal ":="
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))
          "@[%s@ :=@\n %a@]") s pp_mllam body
    | MLsequence l1 l2 =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ";" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
          "@[%a;@\n%a@]") pp_mllam l1 pp_mllam l2
    | MLarray arr =>
      let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) arr in
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "|]"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "|]@]")
    | MLisaccu prefix (mind, i) c =>
      let accu :=
        Format.sprintf
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Accu_"
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))) "%sAccu_%s_%i")
          prefix (string_of_mind mind) i in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "begin match Obj.magic ("
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal ") with"
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "| "
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " _ ->"
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  true"
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal
                                  "| _ ->"
                                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal
                                      "  false"
                                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal
                                          "end"
                                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))))))))))
          "@[begin match Obj.magic (%a) with@\n| %s _ ->@\n  true@\n| _ ->@\n  false@\nend@]")
        pp_mllam c accu
    end
  with pp_letrec
    (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter)
    (defs : array (lname * array lname * mllambda)) {struct fmt} : unit :=
    let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) defs in
    let pp_one_rec (function_parameter : lname * array lname * mllambda)
      : unit :=
      let '(fn, argsn, body) := function_parameter in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
          "%a%a =@\n  %a") pp_lname fn pp_ldecls argsn pp_mllam body in
    (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
    (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
    (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
    (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
    (* ❌ For loops not handled. *)
    for
  with pp_blam (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (l : mllambda) {struct fmt}
    : unit :=
    match
      (l,
        match l with
        | MLconstruct _ _ args =>
          OCaml.Stdlib.gt ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) args) 0
        | _ => false
        end) with
    |
      (MLprimitive (Mk_prod | Mk_sort) | MLlam _ _ | MLletrec _ _ | MLlet _ _ _
      | MLapp _ _ | MLif _ _ _, _) =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%a)") pp_mllam l
    | (MLconstruct _ _ args, true) =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%a)") pp_mllam l
    | (_, _) => pp_mllam fmt l
    end
  with pp_args
    (sep : bool) (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (args : array mllambda)
    {struct sep} : unit :=
    let sep :=
      if sep then
        " "
      else
        "," in
    let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) args in
    if OCaml.Stdlib.gt len 0 then
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      (* ❌ For loops not handled. *)
      for
    else
      tt
  with pp_cargs (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (args : array mllambda)
    {struct fmt} : unit :=
    let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) args in
    match len with
    | 0 => tt
    | 1 =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) " %a") pp_blam
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) args 0)
    | _ =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%a)")
        (pp_args false) args
    end
  with pp_cparam (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (param : option lname)
    {struct fmt} : unit :=
    match param with
    | Some l => pp_mllam fmt (MLlocal l)
    | None =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "_")
    end
  with pp_cparams
    (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (params : array (option lname)) {struct fmt}
    : unit :=
    let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) params in
    match len with
    | 0 => tt
    | 1 =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) " %a") pp_cparam
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.get) params 0)
    | _ =>
      let aux (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (params : array (option lname))
        : unit :=
        (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
        (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
        (* ❌ For loops not handled. *)
        for in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "(" % char
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal ")" % char
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "(%a)") aux params
    end
  with pp_branches
    (prefix : string) (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (bs : mllam_branches)
    {struct prefix} : unit :=
    let pp_branch
      (function_parameter :
        list (((Names.MutInd.t * Z) * Z) * array (option lname)) * mllambda)
      : unit :=
      let '(cargs, body) := function_parameter in
      let pp_c
        (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter)
        (function_parameter : ((Names.MutInd.t * Z) * Z) * array (option lname))
        : unit :=
        let '(cn, args) := function_parameter in
        Format.fprintf fmt
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "| "
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "| %s%a ")
          (string_of_construct prefix cn) pp_cparams args in
      let fix pp_cargs
        (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter)
        (cargs : list (((Names.MutInd.t * Z) * Z) * array (option lname)))
        {struct fmt} : unit :=
        match cargs with
        | [] => tt
        | cons cargs cargs' =>
          Format.fprintf fmt
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "%a%a") pp_c cargs
            pp_cargs cargs'
        end in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ->"
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
          "%a ->@\n  %a@\n") pp_cargs cargs pp_mllam body in
    (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.iter) pp_branch bs
  with pp_primitive
    (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (function_parameter : primitive)
    {struct fmt} : unit :=
    match function_parameter with
    | Mk_prod =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_prod_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_prod_accu")
    | Mk_sort =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_sort_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_sort_accu")
    | Mk_ind =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_ind_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_ind_accu")
    | Mk_const =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_constant_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_constant_accu")
    | Mk_sw =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_sw_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_sw_accu")
    | Mk_fix rec_pos start =>
      let pp_rec_pos (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (rec_pos : array Z)
        : unit :=
        (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
        (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
        (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
        (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
        Format.fprintf fmt
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " |]"
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) " |]@]") in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_fix_accu "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))) "mk_fix_accu %a %i")
        pp_rec_pos rec_pos start
    | Mk_cofix start =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_cofix_accu "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "mk_cofix_accu %i") start
    | Mk_rel i =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_rel_accu "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "mk_rel_accu %i") i
    | Mk_var id =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal
            "mk_var_accu (Names.Id.of_string \"""
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "\"")"
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))
          "mk_var_accu (Names.Id.of_string \""%s\"")") (string_of_id id)
    | Mk_proj =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_proj_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_proj_accu")
    | Is_int =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "is_int"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "is_int")
    | Cast_accu =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "cast_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "cast_accu")
    | Upd_cofix =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "upd_cofix"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "upd_cofix")
    | Force_cofix =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "force_cofix"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "force_cofix")
    | Mk_uint =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_uint"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_uint")
    | Mk_int =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_int"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_int")
    | Mk_bool =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_bool"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_bool")
    | Val_to_int =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "val_to_int"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "val_to_int")
    | Mk_meta =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_meta_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_meta_accu")
    | Mk_evar =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "mk_evar_accu"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "mk_evar_accu")
    | MLand =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(&&)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(&&)")
    | MLle =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(<=)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(<=)")
    | MLlt =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(<)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(<)")
    | MLinteq =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(==)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(==)")
    | MLlsl =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(lsl)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(lsl)")
    | MLlsr =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(lsr)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(lsr)")
    | MLland =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(land)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(land)")
    | MLlor =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(lor)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(lor)")
    | MLlxor =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(lxor)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(lxor)")
    | MLadd =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(+)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(+)")
    | MLsub =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(-)"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "(-)")
    | MLmul =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "( * )"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "( * )")
    | MLmagic =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Obj.magic"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "Obj.magic")
    | MLarrayget =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Array.get"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "Array.get")
    | Mk_empty_instance =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "Univ.Instance.empty"
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format) "Univ.Instance.empty")
    | Coq_primitive op None =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "no_check_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "no_check_%s")
        (CPrimitives.to_string op)
    | Coq_primitive op (Some (prefix, (c, _))) =>
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "%s %a")
        (CPrimitives.to_string op) pp_mllam (MLglobal (Gconstant prefix c))
    end in
  Format.fprintf fmt
    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))) "@[%a@]") pp_mllam l.

Definition pp_array (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (t : array mllambda)
  : unit :=
  let len := (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.length) t in
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
  (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
  Format.fprintf fmt
    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "|]"
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
          CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)) "|]@]").

Definition pp_global (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (g : global) : unit :=
  match g with
  | Glet gn c =>
    let '(ids, c) := decompose_MLlam c in
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "let "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))))
        "@[let %a%a =@\n  %a@]@\n@.") pp_gname gn pp_ldecls ids pp_mllam c
  | Gopen s =>
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "open "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))) "@[open %s@]@.") s
  | Gtype (mind, i) lar =>
    let l := string_of_mind mind in
    let fix aux (s : string) (ar : Int.t) {struct s} : string :=
      if Int.equal ar 0 then
        s
      else
        aux (String.append s " * Nativevalues.t") (Z.sub ar 1) in
    let pp_const_sig (i : Z) (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (j : Z) (ar : Z)
      : unit :=
      let sig_str :=
        if OCaml.Stdlib.gt ar 0 then
          aux "of Nativevalues.t" (Z.sub ar 1)
        else
          "" in
      Format.fprintf fmt
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  | Construct_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))
          "  | Construct_%s_%i_%i %s@\n") l i j sig_str in
    let pp_const_sigs (i : Z) (fmt : Stdlib.Format.formatter) (lar : array Z)
      : unit :=
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      (|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.iteri) (pp_const_sig i fmt) lar in
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "type ind_"
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal "_" % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                          CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format)))))))))))
        "@[type ind_%s_%i =@\n%a@]@\n@.") l i (pp_const_sigs i) lar
  | Gtblfixtype g params t =>
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "let "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))))))
        "@[let %a %a =@\n  %a@]@\n@.") pp_gname g pp_ldecls params pp_array t
  | Gtblnorm g params t =>
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "let "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                            CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                                CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))))))
        "@[let %a %a =@\n  %a@]@\n@.") pp_gname g pp_ldecls params pp_array t
  | Gletcase gn params annot a accu bs =>
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(* Hash = "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int CamlinternalFormatBasics.Int_i
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_precision
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " *)"
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "let rec "
                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Char_literal " " % char
                        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " ="
                            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                              CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "  "
                                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Alpha
                                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                                    (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                      CamlinternalFormatBasics.Force_newline
                                      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                                        CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))))))))))))
        "@[(* Hash = %i *)@\nlet rec %a %a =@\n  %a@]@\n@.") (hash_global g)
      pp_gname gn pp_ldecls params pp_mllam (MLmatch annot a accu bs)
  | Gcomment s =>
    Format.fprintf fmt
      (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
        (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_gen
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Open_box
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Format
              CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format ""))
          (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal "(* "
            (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String CamlinternalFormatBasics.No_padding
              (CamlinternalFormatBasics.String_literal " *)"
                (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                  CamlinternalFormatBasics.Close_box
                  (CamlinternalFormatBasics.Formatting_lit
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.Flush_newline
                    CamlinternalFormatBasics.End_of_format))))))
        "@[(* %s *)@]@.") s
  end.

Fixpoint compile_with_fv
  (env : Environ.env) (sigma : Nativelambda.evars) (univ : option lname)
  (auxdefs : list global) (l : option Names.Label.t) (t : Nativelambda.lambda)
  {struct env} : list global * mllambda :=
  let '(auxdefs, (fv_named, fv_rel), ml) := mllambda_of_lambda univ auxdefs l t
    in
  if
    andb ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.is_empty) fv_named)
      ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.is_empty) fv_rel) then
    (auxdefs, ml)
  else
    apply_fv env sigma univ (fv_named, fv_rel) auxdefs ml

with apply_fv
  (env : Environ.env) (sigma : Nativelambda.evars) (univ : option lname)
  (function_parameter : list (Names.variable * mllambda) * list (Z * mllambda))
  {struct env} : list global -> mllambda -> list global * mllambda :=
  let '(fv_named, fv_rel) := function_parameter in
  fun auxdefs =>
    fun ml =>
      let get_rel_val {A : Set} (function_parameter : Z * A)
        : list global -> list global :=
        let '(n, _) := function_parameter in
        fun auxdefs => compile_rel env sigma univ auxdefs n in
      let get_named_val {A : Set} (function_parameter : Names.variable * A)
        : list global -> list global :=
        let '(id, _) := function_parameter in
        fun auxdefs => compile_named env sigma univ auxdefs id in
      let auxdefs :=
        (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.fold_right) get_rel_val fv_rel auxdefs in
      let auxdefs :=
        (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.fold_right) get_named_val fv_named auxdefs in
      let lvl := Context.Rel.length (rel_context env) in
      let fv_rel :=
        (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.map)
          (fun function_parameter =>
            let '(n, _) := function_parameter in
            MLglobal (Grel (Z.sub lvl n))) fv_rel in
      let fv_named :=
        (|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.map)
          (fun function_parameter =>
            let '(id, _) := function_parameter in
            MLglobal (Gnamed id)) fv_named in
      let aux_name := fresh_lname Names.Anonymous in
      (auxdefs,
        (MLlet aux_name ml
          (mkMLapp (MLlocal aux_name)
            ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.of_list) (op_at fv_rel fv_named)))))

with compile_rel
  (env : Environ.env) (sigma : Nativelambda.evars) (univ : option lname)
  (auxdefs : list global) (n : Z) {struct env} : list global :=
  let decl := lookup_rel n env in
  let n := Z.sub ((|Util.List|).(CList.ExtS.length) (rel_context env)) n in
  match decl with
  | Context.Rel.Declaration.LocalDef _ t _ =>
    let code := lambda_of_constr env sigma t in
    let '(auxdefs, code) := compile_with_fv env sigma univ auxdefs None code in
    cons (Glet (Grel n) code) auxdefs
  | Context.Rel.Declaration.LocalAssum _ _ =>
    cons (Glet (Grel n) (MLprimitive (Mk_rel n))) auxdefs
  end

with compile_named
  (env : Environ.env) (sigma : Nativelambda.evars) (univ : option lname)
  (auxdefs : list global) (id : Names.variable) {struct env} : list global :=
  match lookup_named id env with
  | Context.Named.Declaration.LocalDef _ t _ =>
    let code := lambda_of_constr env sigma t in
    let '(auxdefs, code) := compile_with_fv env sigma univ auxdefs None code in
    cons (Glet (Gnamed id) code) auxdefs
  | Context.Named.Declaration.LocalAssum _ _ =>
    cons (Glet (Gnamed id) (MLprimitive (Mk_var id))) auxdefs
  end.

Definition compile_constant
  (env : Environ.env) (sigma : Nativelambda.evars) (prefix : string)
  (interactive : bool) (con : Names.Constant.t)
  (cb : Declarations.constant_body) : list global * Environ.link_info :=
  let no_univs :=
    equiv_decb 0
      (Univ.AUContext.size (Declareops.constant_polymorphic_context cb)) in
  match Declarations.constant_body.const_body cb with
  | Declarations.Def t =>
    let t := Mod_subst.force_constr t in
    let code := lambda_of_constr env sigma t in
    (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
    (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
    let is_lazy := is_lazy t in
    let code :=
      if is_lazy then
        mk_lazy code
      else
        code in
    let name :=
      if interactive then
        Environ.LinkedInteractive prefix
      else
        Environ.Linked prefix in
    let l := Constant.label con in
    let '(auxdefs, code) :=
      if no_univs then
        compile_with_fv env sigma None [] (Some l) code
      else
        let univ := fresh_univ tt in
        let '(auxdefs, code) :=
          compile_with_fv env sigma (Some univ) [] (Some l) code in
        (auxdefs,
          (mkMLlam
            (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
            [ univ ] code)) in
    (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
    (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
    let code := optimize_stk (cons (Glet (Gconstant "" con) code) auxdefs) in
    (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
    (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
    (code, name)
  | _ =>
    let i := push_symbol (SymbConst con) in
    let args :=
      if no_univs then
        (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
        [
          get_const_code i;
          MLarray
            (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
            [ ]
        ]
      else
        (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
        [ get_const_code i ] in
    ([ Glet (Gconstant "" con) (mkMLapp (MLprimitive Mk_const) args) ],
      (if interactive then
        Environ.LinkedInteractive prefix
      else
        Environ.Linked prefix))
  end.

Definition StringOrd :=
  let t := string in
  let compare := (|Util.String|).(CString.ExtS.compare) in
  existT (fun _ => _) tt
    {|
      Stdlib__set.OrderedType.compare := compare
    |}.

Definition StringSet :=
  __Set.Make
    (existT _ _
      {|
        Stdlib__set.OrderedType.compare :=
          (|StringOrd|).(Stdlib__set.OrderedType.compare)
      |}).

Definition loaded_native_files : Stdlib.ref (|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.t) :=
  Stdlib.__ref_value (|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.empty).

Definition is_loaded_native_file (s : (|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.elt))
  : bool :=
  (|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.mem) s
    (Stdlib.op_exclamation loaded_native_files).

Definition register_native_file (s : (|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.elt))
  : unit :=
  Stdlib.op_coloneq loaded_native_files
    ((|StringSet|).(Stdlib__set.S.add) s
      (Stdlib.op_exclamation loaded_native_files)).

Definition is_code_loaded
  (interactive : bool) (name : Stdlib.ref Environ.link_info) : bool :=
  match Stdlib.op_exclamation name with
  | Environ.NotLinked => false
  | Environ.LinkedInteractive s =>
    if andb interactive (is_loaded_native_file s) then
      true
    else
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      false
  | Environ.Linked s =>
    if is_loaded_native_file s then
      true
    else
      (* ❌ Sequences of instructions are not handled (operator ";") *)
      (* ❌ instruction_sequence ";" *)
      false
  end.

Definition param_name : Names.name := Names.Name (Id.of_string "params").

Definition arg_name : Names.name := Names.Name (Id.of_string "arg").

Definition compile_mind
  (mb : Declarations.mutual_inductive_body) (mind : Names.MutInd.t)
  (stack : list global) : list global :=
  let u := Declareops.inductive_polymorphic_context mb in
  let f (i : Z) (stack : list global) (ob : Declarations.one_inductive_body)
    : list global :=
    let ind := (mind, i) in
    let gtype :=
      Gtype ind
        ((|Util.Array|).(CArray.ExtS.map) snd
          (Declarations.one_inductive_body.mind_reloc_tbl ob)) in
    let j := push_symbol (SymbInd ind) in
    let name := Gind "" ind in
    let accu :=
      let args :=
        if Int.equal (Univ.AUContext.size u) 0 then
          (* ❌ Arrays not handled. *)
          [
            get_ind_code j;
            MLarray
